result.execSummary:
The defendant Christopher R. Cudney was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Theft-Movable Property <=$2500, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 943.20(1)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes:
With huber.

Court costs remitted by the Court.  Restitution owed to the victim in this case, MJ, in the amount of $508, has been ordered collected by DOC through Defendant's probation case, 15CF108.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Christopher R. Cudney

defendant.name: Cudney, Christopher R.
defendant.address: 315 1/2 W. Fourth St., Richland Center, WI 53581

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: RCSD DISPO OF WARRANT OR COMMITMENT

Defendant Christopher R. Cudney in court with attorney Lisa A McDougal. Prosecuting Atty Jennifer M. Harper appeared for State of Wisconsin.  15CM133, 15CF108, 15CM202 and 12CF89 called together.  Counsel inform the Court that the parties have an agreement to resolve these matters - in 12CF89, asking for 2-year extension of DPA; in 15CF108, waiving prelim and def pleading to felony bail jumping for 3 years probation consecutive to the jail sentences called for in 15CM202, 120 days both counts, consecutive and 120 days in 15CM133, consecutive.  Intended jail total:  360 days.  Restitution also requested for victim in 15CM133 - $508.  

Def pleads guilty to Count 1/mis. theft in 15CM133, Count 1/mis. theft and Count 2/bail jumping in 15CM202, waives right to prelim and pleads guilty to felony bail jumping/Count 1 in 15CF108.  Court's colloquy on prelim waiver.  Court's colloquy on pleas.  Finding of guilty.  Counsel and Def address the Court.

Sentence:
15CM133 - 120 days jail.  Costs remitted.  Huber granted.  $508 restitution (to be entered on 15CF108, the probation case; Court orders restitution collected by DOC)
15CM202 - 120 days jail on each Count 1 and 2, consecutive to each other and 15CM133.  Costs remitted.  Huber granted.  
15CF108 - Count 1 - sentence withheld for 3 years probation, consecutive to the jail time in the CM cases.  Conditions:  pay costs; attend, pay for, and successfully complete any treatment or educational programs ordered by the agent; restitution as ordered in 15CM133.

Jail is stayed up to two weeks, until on or before July 1, 2016, between 6-7 a.m. 

DPA extended til 10-31-19 in 12CF89.

0 days credit.

DNA sampling to be provided at the RCSD.
